"Sun-kissed eyes" - Create a line of sunglasses that uses a unique tanning technology to gradually darken the lenses while protecting the eyes from harmful UV rays. This would provide a fashionable and functional solution for those who want to achieve a sun-kissed look while still protecting their eyes. Confidence score: 0.8

"Smart sunglasses" - Develop a pair of sunglasses that integrates smart technology such as voice commands, augmented reality, and gesture recognition. This would allow users to control their smartphones, listen to music, and access information without having to take their phones out of their pockets. Confidence score: 0.7

"Eco-friendly sunglasses" - Create a line of sunglasses made from sustainable materials such as bamboo, recycled plastic, and biodegradable materials. This would appeal to consumers who are conscious about their environmental impact and want to make a difference with their fashion choices. Confidence score: 0.6

"Transparent sunglasses" - Design a pair of sunglasses with transparent lenses that allow users to see through while still providing UV protection. This would be ideal for those who want to enjoy the sun while still being able to see their surroundings. Confidence score: 0.5

"Customizable sunglasses" - Create a line of sunglasses that allows users to customize the lenses with different colors, patterns, and designs. This would provide a unique and personalized solution for those who want to stand out from the crowd. Confidence score: 0.4
